name: Why AI Will Help Improve Healthcare
description: With AI-powered protein folding modeling, new treatments for rare disease are excitedly on the horizon.

name: GM Drops Apple Car Play in 2024
description: General Motors has announced that they're dropping CarPlay in their vehicles for 2024. Instead, they're developin their own system - and that's exciting for new devs.

name: Why Chat GPT Can't Replace You
description: Chat GPT is a fantastic tool that will undoubtedly change how we approach work. However, it's not likely to replace the human mind... yet.
